articles.author: Alicia Wallace
articles.title: Americans' debt surpasses $17 trillion for the first time - CNN
articles.description: Americans' debt levels continue to climb to new heights at a time when economic conditions are becoming increasingly less stable.
articles.content:
Americans debt levels continue to climb to new heights at a time when economic conditions are becoming increasingly less stable.
